page.title: 09TRADE
page.content: BLOCK D SQ 3 Following a survey of the area, we found four small shops only. All are locthe North East corner. Two are Newsagent/General stores, offering a wide if fairly expensive range of goods, situated in Neachells Lane and Hart Road. An Off Licence and a Lawn Mower Sales and Repair shop are also sited in Neachells Lane. Local residents do not need to be greatly dependent on these shops because Wednesfield High St. and the Market are near. These provide a wide range of goods for sale. A major influence on the area are the frequent, local bus services which provide easy access to Bloxwich and the centre of Wolverhampton.
